content: let s go camping when summer kicks in my kids ask to go camping every time i am inclined to yield in but then i remember my first camping experience during the day it was all good the sun was shining but then at night all of a sudden there was thunder lighting and a lot of rain i thought i was going to drift off on my air mattress i think i kept my eyes wide open all night maybe next year till then they will have to do with this version camping materials and tools o scheepjes maxi sweet treat 128 tyrian purple o scheepjes catona 412 forest green 162 black coffee 205 kiwi 513 apple granny o hook size 1 25mm for sweet treat o hook size 3 0mm for catona o embroidery needle o duct tape o craft knife o fiber filling o cardboard appr 1 3mm 825gr available at hobby- or art supply shop stitches & abbreviations o slip_stitch slip_stitch o r row o chain chain o scinc single_crochet increase o single_crochet single_crochet o decrease single_crochet 2 together o repeat repeat o bl back loop o round round o magic_ring magic_ring o st stitch pattern copyright © studiomanya 2020 this pattern is for unlimited personal use do not reproduce or sell the pattern the pattern 1 may not be copied in any way print or digitally items made from this pattern may be sold when the designer studiomanya is credited camping notes measurement tent lxwxh 5x 3x5cm / 2x1 2x2inch gauge/gauge 2 5x2 5cm 1x1inch = 12ch/13rows before you start when slip_stitch or single_crochet pieces together be consistent in either slip_stitch all 4 loops or just one of each side the result is this pattern is easy with just a slightly different but few different crochet terms it s only a personal however you would need some preference crochet experience when you see there is a count mistake or your work end up larger or smaller please do now worry just try to improvise rounds round are without slip_stitch at the end row r end with ch1 and turn and start in the second st/chain from hook unless mentioned otherwise all pieces are crochted tightly to create a neat finish also the card boards might be fitting tight if you stretch or block your work first it helps to make it fit pattern copyright © studiomanya 2020 this pattern is for unlimited personal use do not reproduce or sell the pattern the pattern 2 may not be copied in any way print or digitally items made from this pattern may be sold when the designer studiomanya is credited camping trees tree i for each part with forest green make a magic_ring or ch3 and slip_stitch to first chain a rnd1 6sc in magic_ring a rnd2 single_crochet around 6sc rnd3 scinc around 12sc rnd4-rnd5 single_crochet around 12sc rnd6 *scinc single_crochet in next st repeat from * 6x in total 18sc rnd7-rnd8 single_crochet around 18sc rnd9
